summary: The story follows the life of Ryunosuke Tsukue, an amoral samurai and a master swordsman with an unorthodox style.
cast: Raizô Ichikawa|Kôjirô Hongô|Tamao Nakamura|Fujiko Yamamoto|Kenji Sugawara|Jun Negami|Ryûzô Shimada|Toshio Chiba|Saburo Niwamata|Chishû Ryû|Michiyo Ai|Reiko Fujiwara|Yôichi Funaki|Yoichi Mashio|Yoshindo Yamaji|Bontarô Miake|Shôgo Shimada|Shinobu Araki|Tatsuo Hanabu|Shôzô Nanbu|Kôichi Katsuragi|Saburô Date|Kin'ya Ichikawa|Ryûzaburô Mitsuoka|Kôichi Mizuhara|Sumao Ishihara|Okuyama Asao|Jun Fujikawa|Dan Iwata|Akira Shimizu|Kazuo Ôbayashi|Yoshiro Yasuda|Yûji Hamada|Gen Kimura|Kenji Morita
title: Daibosatsu tôge
